verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
VERSE 1:
You have come
And we have found life
Everlasting
Now alive
To know Your freedom
Never ending

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
PRE CHORUS:
You alone have made a way for us
In Your love
You are life

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
I'm living in the light of my Saviour
Dancing in the arms of forever
I'm singing like I'm walking on water
You are life
Alive in me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
VERSE 2:
From greyest skies
To living colour
You have called us
In Your life
Your light uncovered
The world to see now

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
POST - CHORUS:
I give my life to follow
'Cause Your love is all I want now
You are life
You are life
Alive in me

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
BRIDGE:
For all the world to find Your love
For all the world to see that You are God
Forever be lifted high

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The One who holds the universe
And every beating heart across the earth
Jesus be lifted high

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
